explanation: [0-0] A lady in a pink top and white pants is standing on a yellow sandy beach, smiling towards the front with her arms crossed. Behind her are neatly arranged parasols and deck chairs. In the distance, there are some buildings and other tourists, under a grayish-white sky.
[0-4] Then, the lady in the pink top turns to the left, raising both arms and striking a bow-drawing pose towards the front, her long hair fluttering gently in the wind.
